title: Multimodal Learning Strategies for Improving Second Language Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience in reading/listening comprehension
context.additional_context: Blended learning in digitally enabled environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze L2 audiovisual materials through multimodal inputs (audio, video, subtitles) and summarize core content with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can compare the effectiveness of L1 (native language) and L2 (target language) subtitles, select context-appropriate strategies, and explain their rationale
Through project-based assessment, learners can systematically analyze the impact of multimodal integration on language comprehension and produce analytical reports

resources: Authenticated Audio-Visual Materials from BBC and Similar Sources

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
